message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob! I appreciate your offer, but I think it's still a bit low. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $115. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $107.50. Can you consider that?
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'll counter with $112.50. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value of the product. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice! However, I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counter with $111.25. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob! I'll counter with $113. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is the best I can do. Can you consider that?

I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counter with $112. I hope we can meet in the middle this time.
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob! I'll counter with $113.50. This is as high as I'm willing to go. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $112. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counter with $112.75. This is my final offer.
